title: Kemi Badenoch – 2022 Comments on Rishi Sunak Becoming Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Kemi Badenoch, the Conservative MP for Saffron Walden, on Twitter on 22 October 2022.
content: The party needs a unifying figure to do what’s right for the UK. At this moment, I believe that person is Rishi. I’m a fan of Boris but his return, given all that’s happened would not bring people together. We all need to set aside our differences and work for the greater good.
